titles.title: Recognizing the impact of Mr. Hulbert James on politics, urban development, and New York City, and paying tribute to Mr. Hulburt for his lifetime of public service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary: 9/20/2011--Introduced. Recognizes the impact Mr. James Hulbert had on politics, urban development, and New York City. Pays tribute to him for his lifetime of public service.
